transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Namaskar sir, IndiaMART se mai baat kar raha hu, Sahu Engineering Works se Sahu ji se baat ho rahi hai meri?
Customer: Ha Sahu bol raha hu.
Executive: Ji Sahu ji, aapne IndiaMART pe paid service liya hua hai na sir?
Customer: Ha liya hai. To kya hua? Ek bhi enquiry nahi hai. Kya service hai tum logo ka?
Executive: Sir, aapka service to abhi baais tarikh ko hi chalu hua hai na sir?
Customer: Ha to baais tarikh ko chalu hua to ek bhi enquiry nahi aayega kya? Paisa leke thag rahe ho kya tum log?
Executive: Nahi nahi sir, thagne wali baat nahi hai. Aapka service chalu hai sir. Aapko ek buylead bhi aaya hua hai sir.
Customer: Kaha aaya hai? Kuch nahi aaya hai. Fraud company hai tum logo ka. Mera paisa wapas karo.
Executive: Sir, aisi baat nahi hai. Mai check kar pa raha hu, aapko teiis tarikh ko ek buylead aaya hai, hydraulic cylinder ka.
Customer: Nahi aaya hai. Jhooth mat bolo. Mujhe koi lead nahi mila. Mujhe bola tha mahine ka chalees-pachas lead aayega.
Executive: Sir, lead ka flow to buyer ke requirement pe depend karta hai. Hum log guarantee nahi de sakte hai. Par aapka profile hum optimize kar denge.
Customer: Mujhe kuch nahi sunna. Mera paisa wapas chahiye. Chaubees hazar rupaye diya hai maine. Fraud karte ho tum log.
Executive: Sir, dekhiye, policy ke hisab se amount non-refundable hota hai. Par aap itna pareshan hai to mai aapki baat samajh sakta hu.
Customer: To fir kya? Mai consumer court me jaunga. Tum logo ko aise nahi chhodunga.
Executive: Sir, aapse request hai, aap shant ho jaiye. Mai aapki request ko apne senior manager ko escalate kar deta hu. Wo aapse refund ke regarding baat karenge.
Customer: Kab call karega tumhara senior?
Executive: Sir, agle chaubees se adtalis ghante me aapko unka call aa jayega.
Customer: Theek hai. Call nahi aaya to mai complaint karunga.
Executive: Ji sir, bilkul. Aapko call aa jayega. Dhanyawad.
Customer: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving any buyleads since service activation.
- Believes the company is fraudulent and has cheated him.
- Demanding a full refund of the subscription fee.
- Was allegedly promised 40-50 leads per month.
- Threatening to go to the consumer court.


Resolution:

- Informed that one buylead for a hydraulic cylinder was sent.
- Explained that lead flow depends on buyer requirements and isn't guaranteed.
- Stated that the amount is non-refundable as per policy.
- Escalated the refund request to a senior manager.


Next Steps: 
Issue not resolved. A senior manager will call the customer within 24-48 hours to discuss the refund.

Alert (If Any):
refund
cheating
fraud
consumer court
complaint
escalate

@@@Sentiment:
- Angry -> Annoyed

@@@Key Topics:
- buyleads, refund, subscription, complaint, escalation, service activation
